entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
